author: Alex Swoyer
title: Military to operate largest hospital in country...
description: Military to operate largest hospital in country... (Top headline, 13th story, link ) Related stories: MASK OFF: Trump Rages at Critics During Coronavirus Press Conference... Attempts to win daily news cycle feeds chaos... BALZ: Once again, government caught u…
content:
Defense Secretary Mark Esper said Sunday the U.S. military will soon be operating the largest hospital in the United States to treat patients suffering from COVID-19.
